title: Research interests
description: My research focuses on machine learning, specifically in tree-based models and neural network compression. Recent projects include: hierarchical dimensionality reduction and adaptive mix-bit neural network quantization

title: About
description: I am a 4th-year PhD candidate under the advisement of Miguel Á. Carreira-Perpiñán. I completed my Bachelor's degree in Mathematics at Lomonosov Moscow State University (Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics).
